events: Email communication regarding a New York Times article

notes: The document is an email chain. The first email from Nicholas Ribis is a reply to a forwarded message from 'J'. The forwarded message contains a URL to a New York Times article, likely related to the Trump inauguration, based on the URL structure. The URL itself appears to have extra spaces ('20 1 9/05/06', 'p olitics', 'trump -inauguration-step hanie-winston-wolkoffhtml'), which may be transcription errors. The recipient email address for Nicholas Ribis is incomplete. The document includes a standard legal disclaimer and a House Oversight production number.
